cause.description:
Well, as you all know, there are many rural areas in the cities of America. like many other people i dont think its right. unlike alot of people tho, im trying to do something about it. I believe that poverty can be abolished from this country if people from 1st class worlds stand up and do something. This cause that i am starting on Facebook is just one little step to doing that. If we abolish poverty here, we can really give good lives to people who deserve it.
1. To end poverty in Africa
cause.name: APMS
